description: Holly Heart is back for season 13 and in the spirit of classic US season premieres, we put her against a rookie so she can squash her. The rookie is trapped on the mats and makes pathetic noises while she is finger fucked tirelessly. Holly shows no mercy and even makes the rookie quit before she can go 3 rounds. Loser is brutally humiliated and worships the winners body and feet
title: Blond Bombshell, Holly Heart punished curvaceous Rookie, Layton Benton
